author: jstrachan
msg: Adding early version of the <tagdef> tag for use in Maven. This tag doesn't work just yet until we perform the minor refactoring of the Tag protocol so that a TagScript can do lazy bindings of the TagScript to the Tag instance, so that we can support dynamic Tags as well as Ant Tasks inside the same tag library.

author: jstrachan
msg: Patched the HTML parser so that the default behaviour is to preserve case of the HTML tags, using the first tag as the decider if the cases are different.
Also created a demo to show how the NekoHTML parser can handle plain text too; so we could use this mechanism to parse text files containing Jelly script

author: jstrachan
msg: Added a HTML Jelly library so that regular HTML documents can be parsed and then processed via Jelly, via XPath etc.
This library uses Andy Clark's excellent  NekoHTML SAX parser

author: jstrachan
msg: Refactored the parsing code to make it easier to derive different kinds of XML parsing
